messages.subject: Great Big Happy Life Haiku 2
messages.msgSnippet: Great Big Happy Life Haiku 2 We will wait for spring Toss aside mittens, hats, gloves Smell the earth again. Join us from April 28- May 1 in Lebanon NJ as we
messages.messageBody:
Great Big Happy Life Haiku 2



We will wait for spring

Toss aside mittens, hats, gloves

Smell the earth again.





Join us from April 28- May 1 in Lebanon NJ as we welcome springtime.







Registration for Great Big Happy Life Unschoolers Conference Retreat is in
full swing.with a fast approaching deadline of March 15th- only 43 days left
to register!!

Please consider joining the yahoo group found at
<http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NJUC/> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NJUC/ to
find out more about what is on the schedule and who is coming, etc. We are
gearing up for a wonderful ride and welcome your magic to the list!

You can also visit the website at <http://www.greatbighappylife.com>
www.greatbighappylife.com to find out what the Magnificent Wallflower Club
is really about.and to submit your artwork ideas for the official conference
t-shirts (submission extended to 2/28).



Happy hibernation!



Jennifer Johnson, organizer

Great Big Happy Life Unschoolers Conference Retreat

April 28-May 1, 2009 Lebanon NJ

www.greatbighappylife.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
